content.rendered:
[vc_row el_class=”overflow” css=”.vc_custom_1570735701571{padding-top: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

How to use your content to fuel your funnel and land high-quality leads

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1509032312806{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]When it comes to lead generation, marketers know that good content plays a starring role. But how can you maximize your content strategy to produce the best results?

In this free eBook by SharpSpring and BrandPoint, you’ll discover how you can leverage content and marketing automation to generate high-quality leads.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text=”Find out how the right combination of automated marketing and content can help you:” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Open%20Sans%3A300%2C300italic%2Cregular%2Citalic%2C600%2C600italic%2C700%2C700italic%2C800%2C800italic|font_style:300%20light%20regular%3A300%3Anormal” css=”.vc_custom_1573475602392{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}” el_class=”xm-hide font-size-30px”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron xm-hide”]

  • Gain insight about your brand audience.
  • Turn your prospects into qualified leads.
  • Effectively nurture and convert those leads to sales.

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”xm-hide” css=”.vc_custom_1555952714311{padding-top: 20px !important;}”][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_separator color=”green” align=”align_left” border_width=”3″ el_width=”50″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1523913504382{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}”]”Personalized content and marketing automation are two major pillars of lead generation, which is why we collaborated with SharpSpring to share valuable strategies for digital marketers.” – Claire Berge, Director of Marketing at Brandpoint[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”158563″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus-25-percent” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_column_text el_class=”hidden”]

I Want The eBook:


Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy

[/vc_column_text][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
